name: Metal Skin
description:
You are a prisoner sentenced to death. However in this world death comes in the form of entertainment. Your punishment is to fight in the Metal Skin Arena, a tournament hosted by the NeoLaw Foundation.

Prisoners are dropped in the mech hangar and mount the first mech they can find. Those who don't make it are met with an early death.

Do you have what it takes to survive the onslaught?

This game is a Mechjam 2021 submission
